description:
If you are looking for more of a connection than flats can offer but not ready for clipless pedals, then these pedals are worth a look. Sold with toe clips already attached, the Adventure SL Plus pedal provide a stable pedalling platform and excellent power transfer. Toe clips hold your foot in the optimum pedalling position and the straps lets you cinch in the perfect amount of retention.

  • Toe clips provide improved power transfer and improved efficiency
  • Alloy body and steel cage balance strength and weight
  • Reflectors help keep you seen
  • 9/16in. chromoly axle
name: Evo Adventure SL Plus Platform Pedals with Strap
